title: 9/21/17 - Free Speech Crisis (Saul Hansell & David Meade join Glenn)
description:
The First Amendment protects speech, all speech...we must stop being offended...no safe zones...Parents, your kids 'must' learn the US Constitution ...Oh yeah, the end of the world is this Saturday...Red moons, raptures and Planet X ...The apocalypse, according to John, Revelation 12 ...'Planet X - 2017 Arrival' author David Meade joins the show to talk about Saturday, Sept. 23 being the beginning of the end times?...Technology reporter Saul Hansell discusses his 2008 NY Times article, 'One Subpoena Is All It Takes to Reveal Your Online Life'...allowing the government to invade our privacy...War on Terror: Who really are the good guys and bad guys?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
